short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copies pull request links from bitbucket page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension copies pull request links from Bitbucket page and pastes it to the clipboard in link format. 
Bitbucket doesn't have a function to copy all your pull requesters and you do it manually. It's very slow. 
With this extension you press one button and share pull requests with your teammates.
Extension works with bitbucket "Overview" and "Pull Requests" pages.
It is open source chrome extension. See the source code in the github page.
